description.narrative: Project 6 will finance the water supply and sanitation systems in Marneuli, Bolnisi, and Chiatura. The first component includes construction of: (i) water supply and sewerage systems, including a new sewage treatment plant (STP) in Marneuli; (ii) the sewerage system in Bolnisi which will be connected to the Marneuli STP; and (iii) the water supply system and a new STP in Chiatura. Project 6 will benefit approximately a population of 37,380 in Marneuli, 9,000 in Bolnisi, and 15,400 in Chiatura. The second component includes project implementation support.
